top_positive_factors.explanation: Score agregado de calidad de oportunidad
Peso de ventas históricas de Product A

top_negative_factors.explanation: Tasa de éxito histórica con el cliente
Nivel global de actividad del cliente
Interacciones y calidad de relación con el cliente
Número de contratos con el cliente

next_steps: Address the low customer hit rate by proactively understanding and mitigating any past negative experiences or unmet expectations from previous Schneider Electric engagements.
Improve customer activity by scheduling a follow-up meeting focused on addressing their specific needs and demonstrating the value proposition of our solutions for their business challenges.
Enhance customer engagement by tailoring communication and providing customized resources, like case studies or product demos, that directly align with their priorities and pain points.
